reviews.review: КРУТАЯ ИГРА ОЬЯЗАТЬЕЛЬНО ПРАЙДУ 2 ЧАСТЬ

One of the most innovative physics/sandbox puzzle games I've ever played. After going to conventions for years and seeing cosplayers dressed as Chell or companion cube, I always thought to myself, "what's the big deal?" Then I finally played Portal and couldn't put it down until I beat it in one sitting.

Great Introduction to the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device (eases you in with placing only blue portals at first) and to GLaDOS (make sure you play with the sound on). 
Honestly you could skip this and play Portal 2 just fine but i'd still recommend this game as there's some cool thing's to discover and it sets you up for the second game both in story and how you perceive characters moving forward. 
One thing to note is that if you are buying for multiplayer then you won't find it here, only in Portal 2.

It's not a long game, but I've replayed it three times now and I've thoroughly enjoyed it each time, and likely will keep enjoying it as I plan on replaying it again soon. The puzzles are challenging, but not hard enough that it takes the fun out of things. It's 2:30 am and it may be sleep deprivation but the ending song made me cry (... though it also made me cry the past 2 times I've played. I'm an emotional dude I guess). My favorite part is the turret arena or the boss fight. The worldbuilding is subtle but if you know where to look it makes the storyline so much more engaging. 10/10

I can see why this game is a classic! I heard the entire story of this game online years ago, but not much gameplay description beyond the basics of portals, so it was still a fun experience to play. The puzzles were a lot easier than I was expecting, and with the graffiti from Ratman they really hold your hand through a lot of the exploration sections. I mention this only because I'm used to games that are spoken of so highly to be frustratingly difficult for me, as I'm mediocre at video games most days. The story was fun, and engaging, and I'm looking forward to trying out the bonus levels and dev commentary, and moving on to Portal 2! Truly and unforgettable experience, and one of my favorite credit sequences ever.

I'm hesitant to call it perfect because I rarely use that word, but it honestly is. It takes a lot of brainpower, but it goes from random tests that get you familiar with the gameplay and then throws a plot at you out of nowhere. And it's freakin FUNNY. So much uniqueness, intelligence, and beauty in this game. I love it so much. Seriously, play this game. Wow.

Truly a masterpiece, and I would recommend Portal to even non-gamers... just like my nephew recommended this to me. Everyone that likes puzzles should play it at least once.

Listening to the commentary during a replay, you can hear how painstakingly the developers tested every chamber with actual, real-life players, watched the players as they took unexpected actions that detracted from the goal of enjoyable gameplay, and then fine-tuned the chambers to alleviate the problems.

Bardzo dobra i nietypowa gra logiczna. Co prawda jest krótka i widać, że był to bardziej poligon dla mechaniki portali. Ale niezwykle angażujący i stymulujący szare komórki. Do tego okraszony ciekawą otoczką. Laboratorium kontrolowane przez SI o kobiecym, modulowanym głosie zwracający się do także młodej dziewczyny będąca testerką kolejnych laboratoryjnych pomieszczeń. Pomieszczeń o zróżnicowanych zagadkach, dodające jakiś nowy element. Pod koniec mamy do czynienia ze znanym już w popokulturze plot twistem ale że pewnie nie wszyscy jeszcze grali, dla pewności o tym nie wspomnę. Archeolodzy growych fabuł, do boju! Source daje radę, gra mimo sterylności ma swój własny przyjemny styl. 

Gra ma dwa poważne wady: pierwsza jest krótka ale rekompensowana świetnym credit song, a druga to końcowe etapy przed bossem, z omackowym wstrzeliwaniem się w każde miejsce by można było wygenerować portal. Jest to czynność męcząca bo trzeba szukać portalogennej powierzchni nie nawet w pobliżu ale gdzieś hen nad nami. Niby to jest urozmaicenie ale średnio sprawdza się w to grze opartej na główkowaniu a nie wypatrywania jakiegoś kafla.

Patrząc na proporcje plusów i minusów, to zdecydowanie pierwsza strona jest miażdżąca mimo wyraźnie uwypuklonych wad. Tytuł stanowczo można określić jako grywalny, wciągający. Krótki ale silnie angażujący.

Minimum bilgi ve MAXİMUM zeka isteyen harika bir oyun. Oyun tek kelime ile mükemmel. Öyle ki oyunu bitirince elinizde gerçek bir portal silahı ile gerçek hayatta yapabileceklerinizin hayalini kurmaya başlıyorsunuz. Oyundaki favori hareketlerden biri hiç şüphesiz sonsuza kadar aşağı düşmektir (yani bence bu oyunu oynayıp da bunu denemeyen yoktur :) ). Mekanikleri ve grafikleri harika ve de test odalarının çeşitliliği insanı sıkmıyor aksine devamlı düşünmeye teşvik ediyor. Hikayesinin bazı kısımları saklı kalsa da oyunun sonu insanı gayet tatmin ediyor. Tavsiye ederim bence herkesin en az bir kere oynaması gereken bir oyun. ([0#}=€ ~~~~~~~0
